  • seisflows3.plugins.solver_io.fortran_binary
  • View page source

seisflows3.plugins.solver_io.fortran_binary

Functions to read and write FORTRAN binary files that are outputted by Specfem

Module Contents

Functions

read_slice(path, parameters, iproc)

Reads SPECFEM model slice(s)

write_slice(data, path, parameters, iproc)

Writes SPECFEM model slice

copy_slice(src, dst, iproc, parameter)

Copies SPECFEM model slice

_read(filename)

Reads Fortran style binary data into numpy array

_write(v, filename)

Writes Fortran style binary files
seisflows3.plugins.solver_io.fortran_binary.read_slice(path, parameters, iproc)

Reads SPECFEM model slice(s)

Parameters

  • path (str) – path to the database files

  • parameters (str) – parameters to read, e.g. ‘vs’, ‘vp’

  • iproc (int) – processor/slice number to read

seisflows3.plugins.solver_io.fortran_binary.write_slice(data, path, parameters, iproc)

Writes SPECFEM model slice

Parameters

  • data (seisflows.Container) – data to be written to a slice

  • path (str) – path to the database files

  • parameters (str) – parameters to write, e.g. ‘vs’, ‘vp’

  • iproc (int) – processor/slice number to write

seisflows3.plugins.solver_io.fortran_binary.copy_slice(src, dst, iproc, parameter)

Copies SPECFEM model slice

Parameters

  • src (str) – source location to copy slice from

  • dst (str) – destination location to copy slice to

  • parameter (str) – parameters to copy, e.g. ‘vs’, ‘vp’

  • iproc (int) – processor/slice number to copy

seisflows3.plugins.solver_io.fortran_binary._read(filename)

Reads Fortran style binary data into numpy array

seisflows3.plugins.solver_io.fortran_binary._write(v, filename)

Writes Fortran style binary files Data are written as single precision floating point numbers
